summary: Provides a collection of authorization helper functions that determine whether a user is allowed to perform read‑only (GET) operations on CKAN objects such as datasets, groups, organizations, users, tags, resources and system settings. Each function evaluates the request context, applies CKAN’s permission model and plugin‑defined labels, and returns an AuthResult indicating success or the required permission.
business_intent: Enforce CKAN’s security policy for data retrieval by checking user permissions before exposing any entity, thereby protecting sensitive information and ensuring that only authorized users can view or list resources.
